title: Poster, "1979 Connecticut Special Olympics", 1979
description: Little boy with blue shirt, on which a yellow "third place" ribbon is pinned. In white text reads: 1979 / Connecticut / Special / Olympics / Central Connecticut / State College / New Britain / June 8, 9 & 10 / Hosts: / Greater Hartford / Jacees.In white text reads: 1979 / Connecticut / Special / Olympics / Central Connecticut / State College / New Britain / June 8, 9 & 10 / Hosts: / Greater Hartford / Jacees. United Technologies logo.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "1979 Connecticut Special Olympics", 1979. Lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-290.
